title: Zots Learns to Share
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 176 words, Level G (Grade 1), Lexile 350L, Fiction Series
description: What should you do when someone asks to share with you? Zots is from outer space and doesn't know how to share. In Zots Learns to Share, Abby tries to teach Zots about sharing. Students will love the funny events and twist ending in this story. This book can also be used to teach students how to identify problems and solutions in a story as well as how to identify and use present-tense verbs.
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Determine problem and solution
wordWork: Multiple Meaning Words                : Identify and use multiple-meaning words
